member.name: T:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor
member.summary: Each extractor is identified by its category and subcategory. The category is the lowercase site name without any spaces or special characters, which is usually just the module name (pixiv, danbooru, ...). The subcategory is a lowercase word describing the general functionality of that extractor (user, favorite, manga, ...).

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.FileName
member.summary: A format string to build filenames for downloaded files with.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Directory
member.summary: A list of format strings to build target directory paths with.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.BaseDirectory
member.summary: Directory path used as base for all download destinations.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.ParentDirectory
member.summary: Use an extractor's current target directory as base-directory for any spawned child extractors.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.ParentMetadata
member.summary: If true, overwrite any metadata provided by a child extractor with its parent's. If this is a string, add a parent's metadata to its children's to a field named after said string.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.ParentSkip
member.summary: Share number of skipped downloads between parent and child extractors.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.PathRestrict
member.summary: A string of characters to be replaced with the value of path-replace or an object mapping invalid/unwanted characters to their replacements for generated path segment names.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.PathReplace
member.summary: The replacement character(s) for path-restrict

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.PathRemove
member.summary: Set of characters to remove from generated path names.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.PathStrip
member.summary: Set of characters to remove from the end of generated path segment names using str.rstrip()

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.PathExtended
member.summary: On Windows, use extended-length paths prefixed with \\?\ to work around the 260 characters path length limit.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.ExtensionMap
member.summary: A JSON object mapping filename extensions to their replacements.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Skip
member.summary: Controls the behavior when downloading files that have been downloaded before, i.e. a file with the same filename already exists or its ID is in a download archive.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Sleep
member.summary: Number of seconds to sleep before each download.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.SleepExtractor
member.summary: Number of seconds to sleep before handling an input URL, i.e. before starting a new extractor.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.SleepRequest
member.summary: Minimal time interval in seconds between each HTTP request during data extraction.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Username
member.summary: The username and password to use when attempting to log in to another site.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Password
member.summary: The username and password to use when attempting to log in to another site.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Netrc
member.summary: Enable the use of .netrc authentication data.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Cookies
member.summary: Source to read additional cookies from.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.CookiesUpdate
member.summary: If extractor.*.cookies specifies the Path of a cookies.txt file and it can be opened and parsed without errors, update its contents with cookies received during data extraction.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Proxy
member.summary: Proxy (or proxies) to be used for remote connections.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.SourceAddress
member.summary: Client-side IP address to bind to.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.UserAgent
member.summary: User-Agent header value to be used for HTTP requests.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Browser
member.summary: Try to emulate a real browser (firefox or chrome) by using their default HTTP headers and TLS ciphers for HTTP requests.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Headers
member.summary: Additional HTTP headers to be sent with each HTTP request,

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Ciphers
member.summary: List of TLS/SSL cipher suites in OpenSSL cipher list format to be passed to ssl.SSLContext.set_ciphers()

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Keywords
member.summary: Additional name-value pairs to be added to each metadata dictionary.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.KeywordsDefault
member.summary: Default value used for missing or undefined keyword names in format strings.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.UrlMetadata
member.summary: Insert a file's download URL into its metadata dictionary as the given name.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.PathMetadata
member.summary: Insert a reference to the current PathFormat data structure into metadata dictionaries as the given name.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.HttpMetadata
member.summary: Insert an object containing a file's HTTP headers and filename, extension, and date parsed from them into metadata dictionaries as the given name.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.VersionMetadata
member.summary: Insert an object containing gallery-dl's version info into metadata dictionaries as the given name.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.CategoryTransfer
member.summary: ransfer an extractor's (sub)category values to all child extractors spawned by it, to let them inherit their parent's config options.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Blacklist
member.summary: A list of extractor identifiers to ignore (or allow) when spawning child extractors for unknown URLs, e.g. from reddit or plurk.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Whitelist
member.summary: A list of extractor identifiers to ignore (or allow) when spawning child extractors for unknown URLs, e.g. from reddit or plurk.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Archive
member.summary: File to store IDs of downloaded files in. Downloads of files already recorded in this archive file will be skipped.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.ArchiveFormat
member.summary: An alternative format string to build archive IDs with.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.ArchivePrefix
member.summary: Prefix for archive IDs.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.ArchivePragma
member.summary: A list of SQLite PRAGMA statements to run during archive initialization.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Postprocessors
member.summary: A list of post processors to be applied to each downloaded file in the specified order.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.PostprocessorOptions
member.summary: Additional Postprocessor Options that get added to each individual post processor object before initializing it and evaluating filters.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Retries
member.summary: Maximum number of times a failed HTTP request is retried before giving up, or -1 for infinite retries.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.RetryCodes
member.summary: Additional HTTP response status codes to retry an HTTP request on.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Timeout
member.summary: Amount of time (in seconds) to wait for a successful connection and response from a remote server.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Verify
member.summary: Controls whether to verify SSL/TLS certificates for HTTPS requests.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Download
member.summary: Controls whether to download media files.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Fallback
member.summary: Use fallback download URLs when a download fails.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.ImageRange
member.summary: Index range(s) selecting which files to download.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.ChapterRange
member.summary: Like image-range, but applies to delegated URLs like manga chapters, etc.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.ImageFilter
member.summary: Python expression controlling which files to download.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.ChapterFilter
member.summary: Like image-filter, but applies to delegated URLs like manga chapters, etc.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.ImageUnique
member.summary: Ignore image URLs that have been encountered before during the current extractor run.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.ChapterUnique
member.summary: Like image-unique, but applies to delegated URLs like manga chapters, etc.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.DateFormat
member.summary: Format string used to parse string values of date-min and date-max.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.Modules
member.summary: List of internal modules to load when searching for a suitable extractor class. Useful to reduce startup time and memory usage.

member.name: P:GDL.Extractors.IExtractor.ModuleSources
member.summary: List of directories to load external extractor modules from.
